contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Software | name = Xpadder | logo = [[Image:Xpadder Logo.gif|100px]] | screenshot = [[Image:Xpadder Screenshot.gif|300px]] | caption = Xpadder interface shown on Windows Vista. | developer = Jonathan Firth | latest release version = 2012.12.31<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://xpadder.com/forum4/viewtopic.php?f=26&t=2748|title=What's new in the new versions?}}</ref> | latest preview version = Nightly Forum Builds | status = Active | platform = [[Microsoft Windows]] | genre = Keyboard and mouse emulation | license = [[Proprietary software]] | website = {{URL|http://xpadder.com/}} }} '''Xpadder''' is a program that has the ability to emulate a [[mouse (computing)|mouse]] and/or [[Keyboard (computing)|keyboard]] using a controller or [[joystick]]. This is primarily used for playing games with poor or no controller support, but Xpadder can be used in a web browser, media player, or almost any other application. Xpadder supports the use of up to 16 controllers simultaneously and if a controller supports it, Xpadder can assign a button to make the controller [[Haptic technology|rumble/vibrate]]. == Features == *Keyboard and mouse emulation. *Profile management. *Support for any controller recognized by [[Microsoft Windows]] *Support rumble on capable controllers. *Sets for using keys as a switch and emulating more keys than a controller physically has. == Limitations == Xpadder does not work on some online multiplayer games which make use of anti-cracking software. Games using [[GameGuard]], such as [[MapleStory]], sometimes block Xpadder. Servers running [[PunkBuster]], however, do not have this problem, allowing Xpadder to be used with PunkBuster-enabled games. "PrtSc" (Print Screen) and "Pause" buttons are not yet supported. == Development Status == *Versions of the program after 5.3 are available as commercial software and are officially supported on the website, while 5.3 and all previous versions are freeware. ==External links== *{{official website|http://xpadder.com/}} *[http://cid-fc27c1bc742b93af.skydrive.live.com/browse.aspx/Xpadder/Xpadder%20for%20Newbies-%20The%20Manual Xpadder for Newbies- The Manual] Unofficial Manual - very useful for those uncertain about how to correctly set up xpadder. ==References== {{Reflist}} [[Category:Proprietary software]] [[Category:Humanâ€“computer interaction]] [[Category:Video game controllers]]
